# externalMetadata

**Instance Property**

An array of additional metadata for the player item to supplement or replace an asset’s embedded metadata.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var externalMetadata: [AVMetadataItem] { get set }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVKit/AVPlayerViewController] supports displaying the following metadata identifiers:

- [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataKey/commonKeyTitle]
- [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataIdentifier/iTunesMetadataTrackSubTitle]
- [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataIdentifier/commonIdentifierArtwork]
- [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataKey/commonKeyDescription]
- [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataKey/iTunesMetadataKeyContentRating]
- [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataKey/quickTimeMetadataKeyGenre]
title: externalMetadata
